about_the_game:
Glass Heart: Retold is a fresh take on the original game, Glass Heart.

Fall in love all over again in this revised version featuring: additional characters and illustrations, updated and longer routes, updated UI, and more!

What would you do if your story were coming to an end? Would you choose to live, or would you close your eyes and escape into a beautiful dream?



Meira, the Glass-Hearted Girl, is faced with almost certain demise. She only has a twenty percent chance to survive her upcoming surgery…. Without it, she’s doomed to die.

As she looks out her hospital window, she thinks about her life. It’s an existence confined to hospital rooms that sustain her but also imprison her… an existence filled with vital sign checks, rounds of endless medications, and the constant irregular beeping of her heart monitor.

The world beyond her hospital window is one she’s always yearned for. It’s so vast and filled with many unknowns. It’s a life of mystery that she wants to uncover. It’s a mystery that she’s only ever dreamed of while watching everyone else walk away from Wellston Memorial.

Join the glass-hearted girl as she learns what it means to truly live… and as she searches for the strength to survive.




❥ Six romantic routes: The course of your life can change drastically depending on the choices that you make. Each route takes you on a unique adventure with the man of your choosing.

❥ 60(+) CGs: Lose yourself in each beautiful and heart-wrenching moment with gorgeous illustrations throughout the adventures that you experience.

❥ Safe-Space Option: Opt out of potentially uncomfortable scenes with our Safe-Space Option. This feature allows you to be notified of potentially uncomfortable scenes and gives you the option to receive a summary as an alternative.

❥ Fully voiced: Even the extras are voiced? Yes, even the extras are voiced in Glass Heart: Retold. The only character who is not fully voiced is Meira. Her voice is… yours! [NOTICE: Meira will be voiced throughout the CG moments of the game. She's currently voiced in: Tamaki & Jay's route. Her voice will be updated in patches after Glass Heart: Retold's release until all CG moments are voiced.]

❥ Multiple P.O.Vs: Why limit yourself to knowing only Meira’s thoughts? In this game, you will experience the adventures through multiple characters’ eyes.

❥ Your Choices Matter: The choices that you make impact the outcome of your story. Will you survive, or will you fall into a beautiful dream?

❥ Multiple Endings: Each route features a good and a bad ending. Some endings may even unlock a path, one that continues the story far beyond what you originally expect.

short_description: A modern romance otome/visual novel filled with drama, angst, adventure and, most of all, love. With a twenty percent chance to survive, you decide to experience living outside of a hospital for the first time. Can your heart handle the love that you find along the way?
